ClearAllCmdHdr.Title: Clear All
ClearAllCmdHdr.ShortHelp: Removes the content loaded in the app.
LargeTilesLayoutCmdHdr.Title: Large Tiles View
TilesLayoutCmdHdr.Title: Tiles View
ThumbnailsLayoutCmdHdr.Title: Thumbhnails View
CompareHdr.Title: Compare Structure
CompareHdr.ShortHelp: Opens the Compare widget to show the differences between the selected objects, or between the selected object and another structure or filter.
CompareHdr.LongHelp: If you selected only one object, load another object in the right section of Compare's home page.
DeleteHdr.Title: Delete
DeleteHdr.LongHelp: If you select one object, to also delete its children, select the Include structural objects option.
DuplicateHdr.Title: Duplicate
DuplicateHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a copy of the selected objects.
DuplicateHdr.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, select the credentials to assign to the duplicates.

You can enter a prefix for the duplicates in Add prefix box.

To also duplicate the children of the selected objects, select the Include structural objects option.
HistoryHdr.Title: Revisions
HistoryHdr.ShortHelp: Displays the revisions and branches of the selected object. You can also display its duplicates.
HistoryHdr.LongHelp:
The links between objects and the lifecycle icons show the lifecycle operation that created them.

Use the toolbar to navigate and resize the display. You can also display the graph list view to see the objects in a spreadsheet.
IterationsHdr.Title: Iterations
IterationsHdr.ShortHelp: Displays the iterations of the selected representation.
IterationsHdr.LongHelp: In the dialog box, select an iteration on the iteration line at the bottom to display information about it.
MaturityHdr.Title: Maturity
MaturityHdr.ShortHelp: Modifies the maturity state of the selected objects.
MaturityHdr.LongHelp: In the dialog box, select the target state from the maturity graph if you selected one object, or from the list if you selected several objects. Then, click OK.
NewBranchHdr.Title: New Branch
NewBranchHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a branch from the selected objects.
NewBranchHdr.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, select the credentials to assign to the new branches.

If you select one object, you can enter a title for the new branch. If you select several objects, you can enter a prefix for the new branches.

You can enter a comment for the new branches in the Revision Comment box.
ReviseFromHdr.Title: New Revision From
ReviseFromHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a revision of the selected structure using the content of another structure.
ReviseFromHdr.LongHelp:
In the dialog box, select the source, which can be a revision, a duplicate or a branch.

Choose the appropriate option for each child node, and click Revise.
RevisionHdr.Title: New Revision
RevisionHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a revision of the selected objects.
